meeting_annotations.speaker: Wei Min
meeting_annotations.transcript: I think Rama is is definitely quantitative by nature. So essentially we're reporting the number of chemical bonds in the sample. So that's what we can report. And of course, how to translate that into a concentration or into, you know, how much what's the milligram of the molecules that that needs some simple chemical conversion, but I think the the whole the whole chain of the calculation is very very very very quantitative.
